comments.comment: Hamuduruwane sri lankawata eda sitama onama ehekuta awith onama wasuruwak danna desha palakain ida dunna.asarana helainta virudda wemata noheki lesa mun neethi damma.2015 sita adika lesa muslim janagahanaya wedi una.a pitin muslim un genath mehe padinchi karanna awasara lebuna chanda ganna.hedunum path 2 gane hadala depara gane chande damma kiyala ek madya nalikawaka muslim ayekma kiwwa.dan munta natanna deela nihada inna bahe hamuduruwane.api ekata ekathu we me hela deshaya reka ganna ona kalaya awith.adath innawa moda thakatheeru sinhalayan pirisak me desha paaluwange paksha patata rewatuna.eth buddimath helayan wedi nisa api ikmaninma jaya ganiwe ape rata gena.

comments.author: Ahamed Zameer

replies.replyComment:
@Ahamed Zameer 
Me ratata rawana aawata rawana kiyanne sinhalayek nemei.
 Anika ape bhashawata witharai apema kiyala akshara saha wachana thiyenne.
 Oyata me gena pehediliwama dena ganna one nam mahacharya  pandith Induragare Damma himiyangen asa dena ganna.
Mokada meke comment karala pehedili karanna giyoth loku kaalayak wagema poth pitu deka thunaka wistharayak obathuma wenuwen mata type karanna wenawa.
 Ketiyenma kiwoth ape sinhalaya kiyanne  gahata galata irata handata yakshayanta naagayanta puda pooja pawathwapu swayanjatha swayanposhitha jathiyak. Eka manawa wargayage bihi weemath samaga diyunu wemin me thaak kal bhashawath jathiyak rekunu reka gaththa loke ekama jathiya thamai siw hele sihala jathiya.
 Budun upan indiyawatawath ounta aawenika unu akshara maalawak ho bhashawak ne.
 Anika me ratata Vijaya eddith kuweniya kapu redi wiyamin siti bawata thamai lanka ithihasaye liyawenne a kiyanne api eda indalama wasthra anda jathiyak .
Me ratata budu dahama eddi api goththrika kramayata gas gal naaga yaksha adahum kare. Mulinma budu dahama shrawanaya karala budu dahama welanda gaththe raakshayan yakshayan wandanamana karapu jana kottashaya ita passe thamai anith adahili karapu aya budu dahama welanda gaththe.
 Budu dahama kiyanne pothakata simawela thiyena anith aagam ha samana deyak nowe.
 Thripitakaye thiyenne me sasara gamane ek ek pudgalayan jeewithaya hadagena sasara duken midunu heti saha jeewithaya waraddagena sasare thawamath duk windina heti.
Ein apita ape jeewitha hari magata ganna kiyala denawa misak balapem karala ne.
Namuth muslim aagame kaholika aagame ehema ne.
An aagamwalata garhala ne. Namuth anith aagamwala budu dahamata garahanawa budun wahanse kiyanne gini godakata samana karalai muslim aagame salakanne.
 Mama den aurudu gaanak me arabi kare ratawal 4 sewaya kara. Man dannawa me ratawalwala budu dahamata kohoma selakilida thiyenne kiyala. Anithima bauddayek kiyannawath be. Beriwelawath denagaththoth poddak hari hitha honda minissu nam lankawata yawanawa. Nethnam danduwam denawa.
Baudda darshanaye ehema ne. 
Oyage muthun miththan bauddayan wenna athi namuth ada oyage aakalpa wenai. Ehemai kiyala oyalata me raten yanna kiyanne ne api. 
Me rate witharak nemei onema rataka mul padinchi karuwan unu maha jathiyak thiyenawa a jathiyata anannya una sanskruthiyak nithiyak thiyenawa. Anna a nithiyatath sanskruthiyatath garu kireema sesu jana wargayage yuthukama saha waga kima. Namuth ada muslim anthawadee sulutharayak me dekama ballata daala weda karanawa. Jeewitha pawa winasha karana thenata path wela.
 Anna ekai nathara wiya yuththe.
 Therum ganna. Weradi manasgatha mathayangen midenna. Anna edata me rata thawath loketa abiyogayak wei.

@Nirmala Pushpakumari Sahoderiya matath aadambarai ,mokada  me mageth muthun miththangena ne api katha karanne..Rawana raju sinhalada kiyala hoyala balanda ...singhale kiyaneka kohinda patan ganne kiyala poddak soya balanda...man sinhaletath  ape ratatath godak aadarai. Budhu dhahamatath mama itha ihalin garu karami.anith aya wage Anya aagam gena kisima deyak dhanne nethuwa budhu dahamath pataheniwa itha aseelasharee lesa hasirenne nethiwa me sanwadaya aran giyata obata man garu keranawa sthuthi karanawa. Ea dahamata kalalayak wenda man ida thiyanne ne , ea hindha man nihanda wemi.mage muththa singhala wela man muslim unai kiyala mam me raten ayin wenne nene. Sahodhariy suba dawasak jaya wewa ape ratata.

@helaya 89 Sahaodara mata samwenda mama nihanda wennam...aseelachara lesa hasireemen, man itha usus lessa dhakina oya dhahamenmai oya poshene wela thiyenne kiyala anith aya weradi sithwillak hadha geneemata man ida thiyanne...suba dhawasak.

Dannathi huththe ithihasayak gana kiyawannathuwa yanawada kari hamba patiya. Wije rajathuma eka ganiyek banda kiyala mulu ratama wenas wenawada gon uru patiyo. Thopi wage gonnu inna hindae thoge ara uru nabithuma kiyana pahara ballata ubalawa modaya karaganna puluwan une. U hinen dakala kiyapu Huththawal piligaththa thope un yakshayekwa adahanawa. Thopi me lokenma kana welawa wadi athaka na.
oyalata onne me para ponna ‡∂Ü‡∂´‡∑ä‡∂©‡∑î‡∑Ä nam un akka akathuwela amaricawa dihawata ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ..ape rata hadaganna dila....me kathawata virudda thopi okkama...anthawadiyo.....

@Ahamed Zameer 
Ow apita aadambarai thamai. Adatath loke minissu sinhalaya gena kiyanne aadambara jathiyak kiyala. 
Aththath ekama thamai. Ape un salli walata badagosthara wadeta eka ekata kade yana moda heththak wagema a mooda kamath ekka ada  lokeyak hollanneth ape un. 
A maha kalu sinhalayo . 
  Naasa aayathanaye indala idi katu kamhalata enathek me rate sinhalu thamai inne.
 Eka ne kiyala oppu karanna puluwannam .
Rawana yugayen passe buddiya thawath wardanaya unu loketa ahas yanaya hoyala deepu ekama jathiya thamai kalu sinhala jathiya.
   A nisa me rate ithihasaya pothen wenas karata hadawathwlin sinhala lein wenas karanna  be. 
Aththath yatharathayath ekai.

@Ahamed Zameer api kiyane ithihase mona unath oya golange agame thiyana itha kaunawantha nethi ape rate karana epa ara bombayak purrawagena maruna modaya vage oya inna Lankawe oyage siya hitiye kohomada evage
@Nirmala Pushpakumari Niyamai sahodariya Ape ratata ' 'Lamuria'-''kumarikkandam' kalaye sita thibena ithihasayak thiyana bawa hithankotath apita aadambarai....

@Ahamed Zameer 
Hallo sahodaraya  me rate Vejege wath  sithagewath paramparawak ne hallo. Me rate inne swaynjatha paramparawak. 
Puluwannam oya ochcharatama ithihasaya dannawanam kiyannako balanna me loke mona rateda aurudu 2600 baudda ho wenath aagam ithihasayak thiyena ratak?
  Thawa ekak Aurudu 3-40000 kwath parana  natabun thiyena ratak kiyanna?
